Class DockerRegistry

java.lang.Object
com.github.cowwoc.digitalocean.resource.DockerRegistry
public final class DockerRegistry extends Object
A registry of docker repositories.

  • Method Details

    • get

      public static DockerRegistry get(DigitalOceanClient client) throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Returns the account's docker registry.
      Parameters:
      client - the client configuration
      Returns:
      null if the account does not have a container registry
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if client is null
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • getRepositories

      public List<DockerRepository> getRepositories() throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Returns the image repositories in the registry.
      Returns:
      the repositories
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • getRepositoryByName

      public DockerRepository getRepositoryByName(String name) throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Looks up an image repository by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the repository
      Returns:
      null if the repository was not found
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if name is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if name contains leading or trailing whitespace or is empty
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • getHostname

      public String getHostname()
      Returns the hostname of the registry. For example, given registry.digitalocean.com/nasa, this method will return registry.digitalocean.com.
      Returns:
      the hostname of the registry

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the registry. For example, given registry.digitalocean.com/nasa, this method will return nasa.
      Returns:
      the name of the registry

    • getFullyQualifiedName

      public String getFullyQualifiedName()
      Returns the fully qualified name of the repository (e.g., registry.digitalocean.com/nasa).
      Returns:
      the fully qualified name

    • deleteUnusedLayers

      public void deleteUnusedLayers() throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Deletes unused image layers from the registry.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • getCredentials

      public DockerCredentials getCredentials(boolean writeAccess, Duration duration) throws IOException, TimeoutException, InterruptedException
      Returns docker credentials for this registry.
      Parameters:
      writeAccess - true to grant write access. By default, credentials only grant read access.
      duration - the duration that the returned credentials will be valid for
      Returns:
      docker credentials for this registry
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if duration is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if duration is negative or zero
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.
